verbs.description: [V: slain] [ARG1: birmingham grandparents] were two of the finest people you could ever hope to meet our community is heartbroken by the loss of mary and steve holt to a senseless act of violence according to a gofundme launched to help with burials grace episcopal church jefferson county steve holt woodlawn ninth court circle south birmingham grace church sgt johnny williams lacinda riesland holts
